name: Puzzle For Charity
description:
Puzzle for Charity is a small casual sliding puzzle game.

In addition, there is a pairs mode, where you have to find equal pairs.

It is our kick off project, with which we want to officially enter the gaming industry.

Where charity is in the name, charity is in the game!

We have linked a few organizations that we want to draw attention to and where you can donate.

Why only one link?

We are still a very small studio and first want to gain the trust of the players.

That's why we don't let donations go directly through us for the time being and direct you to the organizations.

We are already working on new and bigger projects and try to grow with new challenges!
